articles.description: On November 2, Mumbai City named DafaNews as their sponsors for the season. Four days later, ATK Mohun Bagan declared SBOTOP.net as their principal sponsor in a two-year deal.
articles.content:
Written by Mihir Vasavda
 | New Delhi | 
Updated: November 16, 2020 12:11:27 pm
Mumbai City sponsor DafaNews is an offshoot of Dafabet. (Source: Mumbai City FC/Twitter)When the new season of India… [+3456 chars]
